top10_tweets_like: Can you believe this coin was rendered entirely in #rstats? In under 10 lines of code? Interesting in calculating diversity values through Hill numbers? Check out the latest version of `hillR` #rstats package. The phylogenetic diversity calculations are much faster in this version. https://t.co/JgbpWLp4PW https://t.co/RJi9q3Kt5P

As promised, gonna try a (short!) live stream video of my preferred setup for reproducible #rstats projects. I'll focus on renv and the new RStudio Package Manager. 

Here's a demo repo I'll be using. https://t.co/pmYcwmTVzL

Should be recorded, but starting in about 20 minutes.

I hit a new level of #rstats expertise today when I finally witnessed the special case error:

> Error in c[1] : object of type 'builtin' is not subsettable

Take that type 'closure'! You're not the only one that's not subsettable.
